name: Tainted Signal
description:
Tainted Signal is a horror game where you must follow the voices coming from your radio to track the items around the island while avoiding the evil that guards them. Come enter a world where danger is at every corner as you are being hunted like an of animal. Gather all the pieces of the lighthouse and use your flashlight to keep the evil at bay. Only through light can it be defied.

Playtime at around 30 minutes

Made in 10 days for the Scream Jam 2020.

WASD to walk

E to interact

Left mouse to turn the flashlight on/off

R to replace a dead battery
